name: Alto Flight Academy
about: Alto Flight Academy, located at KHSD in Yukon, Oklahoma, is a comprehensive flight training institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. We offer a range of programs tailored for students of all levels, from recreational flyers to those aspiring for a career in aviation. Our curriculum includes private pilot training, instrument rating, commercial pilot certification, and multi-engine training, all conducted under FAA Part 141 certification. With a fleet of well-maintained aircraft and experienced instructors, we ensure a safe and effective learning environment. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the achievements of our students, and we are proud to be a leading flight academy in the region, helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals.
